tit.e: Ajitsuke nori (nori flavored with soy source, mirin and seasonings)
Ajitsuke nori (nori flavored with soy source, mirin and seasonings)
Ajitsuke nori (nori flavored with soy source, mirin and seasonings)

sen.j: 味付け海苔（あじつけのり）は、主に醤油と砂糖、香辛料などで味付けした加工海苔製品の総称｡
sen.e: Ajitsuke nori (nori flavored with soy source, mirin and seasonings) is a generic term of processed nori (dried laver seaweed) products mainly seasoned with soy-sauce, sugar, and spices.
Ajitsuke nori (nori flavored with soy sauce, mirin and seasonings) is a generic term for processed nori (dried laver seaweed) products mainly seasoned with soy-sauce, sugar, and spices.
Ajitsuke nori (nori flavored with soy sauce, mirin and seasonings) is a generic term for processed nori (dried laver seaweed) products mainly seasoned with soy-sauce, sugar, and spices.

sen.j: 焼き海苔などが、加工前の大きなサイズ（全形、約21cm×19cm）で販売されているのに対して、8切り(5cm×10cm)や12切り(3.5cm×10cm)程度にカットされた小片が複数枚（5枚程度）セットになって包装された状態で販売されていることが多い｡
sen.e: Whereas Yakinori (toasted laver seaweed) is sold in size as big as the one before being processed (the entire size: about 21cm by 19cm), Ajitsuke nori is often sold as a set of several small sheets (about five sheets) being cut into the eighth part (5cm by 10cm) or twelfth part (3.5cm by 10cm) of the whole nori sheet in a package.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Whereas Yakinori (toasted laver seaweed) is sold in size as big as the one before being processed (the entire size: about 21cm by 19cm), Ajitsuke nori is often sold as a set of several small sheets (about five sheets) being cut into eight parts (5cm by 10cm) or twelve parts (3.5cm by 10cm) of the whole nori sheet in a package.

Whereas Yakinori (toasted laver seaweed) is sold in size as big as the one before being processed (the entire size: about 21cm by 19cm), Ajitsuke nori is often sold as a set of several small sheets (about five sheets) being cut into eight parts (5cm by 10cm) or twelve parts (3.5cm by 10cm) of the whole nori sheet in a package.

sen.j: 焼き海苔として香りの良く無い物を有効利用することが多い。
sen.e: Yakinori with inferior flavor is often used for Ajitsuke nori for efficient use.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Yakinori with inferior flavor is often used for Ajitsuke nori for efficient use.
Yakinori with inferior flavor is often used for Ajitsuke nori for efficient use.

sen.j: 尚、味付け海苔の発明は山本海苔店2代目山本德治郎。
sen.e: Ajitsuke nori is invented by the second generation of Yamamoto Noriten Company, Tokujiro YAMAMOTO.
Ajitsuke nori was invented by the second generation of the Yamamoto Noriten Company, Tokujiro YAMAMOTO.
Ajitsuke nori was invented by the second generation of the Yamamoto Noriten Company, Tokujiro YAMAMOTO.

sen.j: 加熱乾燥されており、パリパリとした食感であるが、唾液などの水分により溶け出した調味料が口の中で広がる。
sen.e: Ajitsuke nori is heated and dried with crispy touch, and the taste of seasonings came out through juice such as saliva when eating.
Ajitsuke nori is heated and dried with a crispy touch, and the taste of seasonings comes out through juice such as saliva when eating.
Ajitsuke nori is heated and dried with a crispy touch, and the taste of seasonings comes out through juice such as saliva when eating.

sen.j: ただし、味付けに用いられている調味料により、調味されていない製品と比較して吸湿性が高まっており、パリパリとした食感を楽しみたい場合には、食べる直前に開封する｡
sen.e: Since the moisture absorbency is enhanced by seasonings used for seasoning, compared with unseasoned food, it is recommended to eat it just after opening its package for enjoying its crispy touch.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Since the moisture absorbency is enhanced by seasonings used for seasoning, compared with unseasoned food, it is recommended to eat it just after opening the package for enjoying its crispy touch.
Since the moisture absorbency is enhanced by seasonings used for seasoning, compared with unseasoned food, it is recommended to eat it just after opening the package for enjoying its crispy touch.

sen.j: また、開封後しばらくすると湿気を吸って溶け出した調味料により、海苔同士が張り付く、取り上げる際に調味料が手に付くなど扱いにくくなる｡
sen.e: After some time from opening, it would be hard to handle Ajitsuke nori which stick together or get sticky when holding it due to seasonings leaked out after absorbing humidity.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: After some time after opening, it would be hard to handle Ajitsuke nori which sticks together or becomes sticky when holding it due to seasonings leaking out after absorbing humidity.
After some time after opening, it would be hard to handle Ajitsuke nori which sticks together or becomes sticky when holding it due to seasonings leaking out after absorbing humidity.

sen.j: 一般に甘味および塩分の強いたれにより調味されているため米飯との相性は良い｡
sen.e: Ajitsuke nori, being seasoned with sweet and salty sauce, goes well with rice.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Ajitsuke nori, being seasoned with sweet and salty sauce, goes well with rice.
Ajitsuke nori, being seasoned with sweet and salty sauce, goes well with rice.

sen.j: 卵かけ御飯等とともに食べる際には、小片のまま米飯を包むようにしたり、かき混ぜ易くするために一辺が1センチ程度になるように手で揉みつぶしてふりかけられる。
sen.e: When eating it with tamago kake gohan (rice with a mixed raw egg put on), a small portion of rice is wrapped by Ajitsuke nori or Ajitsuke nori is rubbed in one's fingers for pieces in about 1cm by 1cm to be sprinkled over and stirred with rice.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: When eating it with tamago kake gohan (rice with a mixed raw egg put on), a small portion of rice is wrapped by Ajitsuke nori or Ajitsuke nori is rubbed in one's fingers with pieces about 1cm by 1cm sprinkled over and stirred with rice.

When eating it with tamago kake gohan (rice with a mixed raw egg put on), a small portion of rice is wrapped by Ajitsuke nori or Ajitsuke nori is rubbed in one's fingers with pieces about 1cm by 1cm sprinkled over and stirred with rice.

sen.j: 徳島県の大野海苔や広島県のかき醤油海苔など、各地で独自の味付けを施した海苔も販売されている。
sen.e: Noris originally seasoned in each area including Ono nori in Tokushima Prefecture or Oyster soy-sauce nori (laver) in Hiroshima Prefecture are sold.
sen.cmt: 大野海苔→定訳不明ですが→Ononori と訳出しています。
sen.e: Nori originally seasoned in each area including Ono nori in Tokushima Prefecture or Oyster soy-sauce nori (laver) in Hiroshima Prefecture are sold.
Nori originally seasoned in each area including Ono nori in Tokushima Prefecture or Oyster soy-sauce nori (laver) in Hiroshima Prefecture are sold.

sen.j: 韓国海苔と呼ばれる製品はごま油と塩で味付けされており、ごま油の香ばしい香りがする。
sen.e: A product called the Korean nori is seasoned with sesame oil and salt, and it is with a good flavor of sesame.
A product called Korean nori is seasoned with sesame oil and salt, and it has a good flavor of sesame.
A product called Korean nori is seasoned with sesame oil and salt, and it has a good flavor of sesame.

sen.j: 調味料は、2回に分けられた乾燥工程の合い間にローラーによって塗布される｡
sen.e: Seasonings are applied by roller between two drying processes.
sen.cmt: 乾燥工程→drying processと訳出しました。
sen.e: Seasonings are applied by roller between two drying processes.
Seasonings are applied by roller between two drying processes.
